content:
The given chunk is part of a larger document that defines several NodePath extension functions (printPosHprScale, subdivideCollisions, r_subdivideCollisions, r_constructCollisionTree, and analyze) that are converted into methods using Dtool_funcToMethod. The code converts these standalone functions into instance methods for the NodePath class and then deletes the original function names to clean up the namespace.

Dtool_funcToMethod(printPosHprScale, NodePath)
del printPosHprScale
#####################################################################
